<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ignore segments that run to the end of basic block because in this case</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// slot is still live at the end of it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Segment.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/liverange/segment/#afe8e59ffc86cb1736116e4dc8b86e26f">end</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex/#a0c74422518b3479395817926489e9eec">isBlock</a>())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Start iteration backwards from segment end until the start of basic</span></CodeLine>
